items.content_html: This project could be a great opportunity to practice front-end development using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, explore frameworks like React or Vue.js for a more dynamic user interface. For the back end, you could use a lightweight server like Express.js (Node.js) or Flask (Python). Implementing a database (SQLite, MongoDB, or similar) .

For the back end, you could use a lightweight server like Express.js (Node.js) or Flask (Python). Implementing a database (SQLite, MongoDB, or similar) .
